titulo: Innovative tools and services to manage and empower energy communities
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:Integration of home and building assets in an efficient way based on common Internet of Things (IoT) communication standards for smart homes and using SGAM architecture and data models (e.g., IEC CIM) for load, generation and storage devices;Facilitate local energy trading and distributed grid-oriented services using micro market and transactions (e.g., peer-to-peer) and improve the market parti
